QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.PERSON_ID, t.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE, op.OBSERVATION_PERIOD_START_DATE, op.OBSERVATION_PERIOD_END_DATE, t.GENDER_SOURCE_VALUE, t.YEAR_OF_BIRTH, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.PERSON as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID JOIN {sc}.OBSERVATION_PERIOD op ON t.PERSON_ID = op.PERSON_ID order by ch.PartitionId, t.PERSON_ID
